name: heliotropism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the growth or movement of a plant, or of a particular part of a plant, towards the sun or away from it: Sunflowers in the bud stage exhibit heliotropism. Heliotropism is like a plant sense; the way that a plant senses the sun and grows toward it.
More examplesFewer examplesGeotropism and heliotropism cause roots to strike into the earth and leaves to turn to the light.He has performed experiments in heliotropism, clearly establishing the power of light in lower forms of organisms.Where a plant exhibits positive heliotropism, the part away from the light attains a greater length than that towards it.
